We must never forget those who were stolen from their families.

New Democrats stand with advocates fighting for #MMIWG Justice and for a Red Dress Alert to save lives.

Leila took on Conservatives and won - her presence in Parliament is a symbol of hope and relief.

A reminder that when we stand united, we can stop Conservative cuts and win.

Corporations have had their government, it's the people's time.

tweets.text:
Shana Tova to Jewish Canadians as they celebrate Rosh Hashanah ‚Äî the start of the Jewish New Year.

This past year has been difficult for Jewish communities who faced a painfully sharp rise in vile antisemitic hate crimes.

As we enter this New Year, let us commit to working together to build a Canada where everyone is safe to practice their faith and celebrate their traditions without fear.

I wish you a sweet year filled with peace, health, and happiness.
